Posts.Content: Read this:http://www.creationsmagazine.com/articles/C113/Dekel.html "...medical thermography has been in use since the early 1970’s and the modality was approved by the FDA in 1982 for breast cancer detection..." It may not be able to specify the location of the tumor, but it can detect the tumor up to 7 years before it is visible to a mammogram.
Posts.Title: Mammogram Alternatives
